attributes.action: balance the argument for tracking vehicles for the road fund licience, the undersigned are in favour of tracking vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the interest of balance we thought it would be prudent to get the british public to have the choice to agree or disagree with the other petition which is against the tracking of vehicles. By publishing this survey it will allow the british public to have two positive choices to make and to stop the goverment using the non voting figures as the peoples preffered choice.We have called the survey a similar name so it would be listed along side the other survey

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "balance the argument for tracking vehicles for the road fund licience, the undersigned are in favour of tracking vehicles."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11461.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/TravelTaxforit/
